attributes.action: F1 Motor Racing going to SKY
attributes.additional_details: The BBC are forcing F1 motor racing fans to go to SKY tv if they want to watch all racing from 2012 live. No one is taking into account that the fans will have to pay to view these races, Once again the Murdochs are thee only ones making any money from this and in light of whats gone on lately this should not be allowed. The BBC had the contract does not run out for 2 years so why change it now. we need to get 100,000 people sign this petition
